alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 10:53PM EST until January 29 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snowfall of under an inch expected. * WHERE...In New York, Chenango, Tioga and Broome counties. In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna and Wyoming counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall is rapidly diminishing in intensity, and will continue to taper off into the early morning hours. Road conditions will remain variable.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
